ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and will never get away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And will not be removed from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then shall never come out of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And will not be able to hide from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they will not be absent therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they shall by no means be absent from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: nor shall they ever be absent from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And will not be absent thence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and from which they will find no escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thence they shall not be allowed to be absent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and they shall not be absent from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they will not be able to keep away therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they (Al-Fujjar) will not be absent therefrom (i.e. will not go out from the Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and from it they shall never be absent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they will not be absent from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And never therefrom will they be absent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:16] and they shall not be absent from it, [they shall not] be taken out of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And will not) i.e. the disbelievers (be absent thence) whence they enter it.
